body.p: Message Invalid character found in the request target [/ebisearch/ws/rest/biosamples?query="Angiostrongylus%20cantonensis"%20OR%20"Angiostrongylus%20costaricensis"%20OR%20"Ascaris%20lumbricoides"%20OR%20"Ascaris%20suum"%20OR%20"Brugia%20malayi"%20OR%20"Brugia%20pahangi"%20OR%20"Brugia%20timori"%20OR%20"Capillaria%20spp"%20OR%20"Clonorchis%20spp"%20OR%20"Contracaecum%20osculatum"%20OR%20"Dibothriocephalus%20latus"%20OR%20"Dicrocoelium%20dendriticum"%20OR%20"Dipetalonema"%20OR%20"Dracunculus%20medinensis"%20OR%20"Echinococcus%20granulosus"%20OR%20"Echinococcus%20multilocularis"%20OR%20"Echinococcus%20vogeli"%20OR%20"Enterobius%20vermicularis"%20OR%20"Fasciola%20gigantica"%20OR%20"Fasciola%20hepatica"%20OR%20"Fasciolopsis%20buski"%20OR%20"Heterophyes%20spp"%20OR%20"Hymenolepis%20diminuta"%20OR%20"Loa%20loa"%20OR%20"Mansonella%20ozzardi"%20OR%20"Mansonella%20perstans"%20OR%20"Mansonella%20streptocerca"%20OR%20"Metagonimus%20spp"%20OR%20"Necator%20americanus"%20OR%20"Onchocerca%20volvulus"%20OR%20"Opisthorchis%20felineus"%20OR%20"Opisthorchis%20sinensis"%20OR%20"Opisthorchis%20spp"%20OR%20"Opisthorchis%20viverrini"%20OR%20"Paracapillaria%20philippinensis"%20OR%20"Paragonimus%20spp"%20OR%20"Paragonimus%20westermani"%20OR%20"Pseudoterranova%20decipiens"%20OR%20"Rodentolepis%20nana"%20OR%20"Schistosoma%20haematobium"%20OR%20"Schistosoma%20intercalatum"%20OR%20"Schistosoma%20japonicum"%20OR%20"Schistosoma%20mansoni"%20OR%20"Schistosoma%20mekongi"%20OR%20"Schistosoma%20spp"%20OR%20"Strongyloides%20spp"%20OR%20"Strongyloides%20stercoralis"%20OR%20"Taenia%20saginata"%20OR%20"Taenia%20solium"%20OR%20"Toxocara%20canis"%20OR%20"Toxocara%20cati"%20OR%20"Trichinella%20nativa"%20OR%20"Trichinella%20nelsoni"%20OR%20"Trichinella%20pseudospiralis"%20OR%20"Trichinella%20spiralis"%20OR%20"Trichostrongylus%20spp"%20OR%20"Trichuris%20trichiura"%20OR%20"Wuchereria%20bancrofti"&fields=id,name,collection_date ]. The valid characters are defined in RFC 7230 and RFC 3986

Description The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).
